job_details.Vacaturetitel: Senior Software Engineer, Full Stack - AI
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Join our dynamic AI team and be at the forefront of innovation. Our mission is to rapidly develop new ideas, collaborate with customers and partners for evaluation, and seamlessly integrate these solutions into our products. This role offers a unique opportunity to work with cutting-edge AI technologies and access invaluable process data through our advanced engine.

   We aim to help our clients achieve streamlined processes faster using AI and leverage the collected data to optimize these processes to the highest degree. This position is perfect for someone passionate about AI, eager to make an impact, and looking to grow with a team dedicated to excellence and innovation.

   In this role, you will play a crucial role in designing and developing the backend infrastructure that enables our enterprise customers to safely integrate AI solutions into their workflows. Your primary focus will be on creating a robust and scalable AI engine that ensures seamless data processing, secure data storage, and efficient model deployment.
     * Design and Develop AI Backend Infrastructure: Design, develop, test, and maintain the AI backend infrastructure, ensuring scalability, reliability, and security.
     * Integrate AI Models into Enterprise Systems: Integrate AI models with enterprise systems, ensuring seamless data exchange, secure data storage, and efficient model deployment.
     * Implement Data Security and Governance: Implement robust data security measures, including encryption, access controls, and auditing, to ensure the integrity of sensitive customer data.
     * Collaborate with Cross-Functional Teams: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including data scientists, engineers, and product managers, to ensure seamless integration of AI solutions into enterprise workflows.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Software Engineer, Full Stack - AI

Join our dynamic AI team and be at the forefront of innovation. Our mission is to rapidly develop new ideas, collaborate with customers and partners for evaluation, and seamlessly integrate these solutions into our products. This role offers a unique opportunity to work with cutting-edge AI technologies and access invaluable process data through our advanced engine.

   We aim to help our clients achieve streamlined processes faster using AI and leverage the collected data to optimize these processes to the highest degree. This position is perfect for someone passionate about AI, eager to make an impact, and looking to grow with a team dedicated to excellence and innovation.

   In this role, you will play a crucial role in designing and developing the backend infrastructure that enables our enterprise customers to safely integrate AI solutions into their workflows. Your primary focus will be on creating a robust and scalable AI engine that ensures seamless data processing, secure data storage, and efficient model deployment.
     * Design and Develop AI Backend Infrastructure: Design, develop, test, and maintain the AI backend infrastructure, ensuring scalability, reliability, and security.
     * Integrate AI Models into Enterprise Systems: Integrate AI models with enterprise systems, ensuring seamless data exchange, secure data storage, and efficient model deployment.
     * Implement Data Security and Governance: Implement robust data security measures, including encryption, access controls, and auditing, to ensure the integrity of sensitive customer data.
     * Collaborate with Cross-Functional Teams: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including data scientists, engineers, and product managers, to ensure seamless integration of AI solutions into enterprise workflows.

profile_classification.rationale: The role emphasizes designing and developing backend infrastructure for integrating AI solutions into enterprise workflows, focusing on data processing, secure storage, and model deployment. This aligns with building production-grade user-facing systems and integrating AI models, which are core to the GenAI Engineer profile.

phrases: designing and developing the backend infrastructure
create a robust and scalable AI engine
Design and Develop AI Backend Infrastructure
Design, develop, test, and maintain the AI backend infrastructure
Integrate AI Models into Enterprise Systems
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to building and maintaining the software systems that host and integrate AI models, including backend infrastructure, data exchange, and deployment mechanisms.

phrases: safely integrate AI solutions into their workflows
ensure the integrity of sensitive customer data
job_tasks.justification: This task category covers the operational aspects of deploying and maintaining AI solutions, including security, data governance, scalability, reliability, and efficient deployment, all of which are explicitly mentioned.

phrases: collaborate with customers and partners for evaluation
seamlessly integrate these solutions into our products
help our clients achieve streamlined processes faster using AI
leverage the collected data to optimize these processes
passionate about AI, eager to make an impact
grow with a team dedicated to excellence and innovation
integrate AI solutions into their workflows
job_tasks.justification: These phrases highlight the need to understand customer needs, business processes, and the strategic goals of integrating AI to achieve business outcomes like streamlined processes and optimization.
While not the primary focus, the job description mentions the need for seamless data processing, secure storage, and exchange, which are components of data engineering.

phrases: Integrate AI Models into Enterprise Systems
job_tasks.justification: The job involves integrating AI models, implying an understanding of how models function and are deployed, though the core focus is not on building or fine-tuning the models themselves.

phrases: data scientists, engineers, and product managers
help our clients achieve streamlined processes faster using AI
leverage the collected data to optimize these processes to the highest degree
